title: सरकार का CAA समर्थन नंबर (88662-88662) -फ्री नेटफ्लिक्स, सेक्स चैट, डेटा के लुभावने वादों से हुआ वायरल
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: To extend your support for the historic Citizenship Amendment Act-2019 brought in by PM @NarendraModi’s government, to ensure justice to the religiously persecuted minorities from Pakistan, Bangladesh and Afghanistan, kindly give a missed call on 88662-88662. #IndiaSupportsCAA pic.twitter.com/g7pTItqYjA
